summary: Ever wish you could show off your passion for PC building in game?  You can now use the Cooler Master Hyper 212 Evo tower heat sink as a sword in Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wish you could show off your passion for PC building in game? You can now use the Cooler Master Hyper 212 Evo tower heat sink as a sword in Skyrim!

You can create the sword at a blacksmith's forge with 3 steel ingots and 1 dwarven ingot. Crafting requires the steel smithing perk.

This mod was created by /u/Toxiguana for the /r/buildapc 200k subscriber giveaway.

Installation:
Copy "CM Hyper 212 Evo Sword.esp" into your data folder.
Copy the "textures" and "meshes" folder into your data folder.
Make sure the mod is ticked in your load order.

Nexus mod manager should work too.

Uninstallation:
Delete the "heatsinksword" folder from Datatexturesweapons and Datameshesweapons. If there are no files in the "textures" and "meshes" folder added from other mods, then you may delete them. Otherwise delete only the files added by this mod (files under "heatsinksword").
Delete "CM Hyper 212 Evo Sword.esp"
author: Toxiguana
